observation: minihiglandcattlesfarm – minihiglandcattlesfarm  Skip to content Home About Available Mini Highland Cattle Testimonials Our-Guarantee Delivery Contact Main Menu WELCOME TO THE MINI HIGHLAND CATTLES FARM Our little babies are ready for their new homes THANKS FOR VISITING! see available goats About the Breed The Highland know more WHO WE ARE The Mini Highland cattles farm is a business that specializes on pygmy and nigerian dwarf cows for sale. We have proudly provided U.S homes with cute and healthy dwarf cows of love for years. As you browse through our website, you will be able to find and even buy a dwarf cow of your choice. More About This Breed Highland cattle live within a hierarchy system, where individuals are ranked, depending on age and sex. Older ones dominate younger ones and males dominate females. In addition, young males begin to dominate adult females, reaching the age of approximately 2 years. Calves, born from the top-ranking cow, automatically get higher positions in the herd, even without their mother’s initiative. Friendly behavior between the animals includes licking, mounting, and play-fighting. They are strong grazers, very skillful in foraging for food. During winter months, they dig through the snow layer with their horns to get to vegetation. In addition, when encountering a predator or a rival, they defend themselves, using their horns. Jaz Emjay Bobo Daisy Tom Lulu 1200 + Animals Saved Hectors Forest Land 0 K+ Members Worldwide $ M+ Funds Raised What We Achieved Mini highland cattles farm are easy to handle; even small children can be at ease with these little cows. The U.S. Department of Agriculture has also approved the Mini highland cattles farm as a livestock dairy Cow, which makes them eligible for youth 4H and FFA projects. What Customers are Saying They made me confident about our purchase and ensured that we will get a beautiful healthy Cow. They were available to answer questions from day 1 and even days after our cow was delivered. They took care of everything! The hardest part was waiting for our cow to arrive. Joyce Schaal We have been looking for a Mini highland cattle farm for a long time from a reputable breeder in a reasonable time frame. The Mini highland cattle farm found us a great cow from an out-of-state breeder and we had her delivered to our doorstep. The service was excellent and we are very pleased with the beautiful healthy cow we purchased. Venessa Ashford Get In Touch Email: CONTACT US Copyright © 2024 [minihighlandcattlesfarm.]

thought: The certificate information shows that the website's SSL/TLS certificate is from Let's Encrypt and is currently valid. This suggests that the website has taken at least the basic steps to secure communication with its visitors. However, possessing a valid SSL certificate does not validate the authenticity of the website's operations or the truthfulness of its content. It is also worth noting that Let's Encrypt certificates are free and commonly used, including by illegitimate websites due to their ease of acquisition. The "Our-Guarantee" page is accessible as the status code is 200. Now I will extract the text from this page to learn about the payment methods and guarantee details provided by the website.
observation: Our-Guarantee – minihiglandcattlesfarm  Skip to content Home About Available Mini Highland Cattle Testimonials Our-Guarantee Delivery Contact Main Menu Health Guarantee THE GUARANTEE Following international health standards, you are advised that within 10 days of recieving your cow, we require you to take the cow to a licensed veterinarian for a checkup. If the VET finds out within the first 10 days of purchasing the goat that it is sick of an illness that has been contracted before the date of delivery, you should contact us immediately. Our  cows are 100% safe, secure, and guaranteed to be in good health and free from any signs of infection at the time we ship them to you. We take pride to say that our relationship with you doesn’t end once you take home a cow from us.  However, some things are not always in our control because a cow’s health depends on many things like genetics, exercise, nourishment, and overall daily care In case of the unforeseen event of death within one year from its purchase date, or if the cow is found to possess health disorders (within 1 year) which adversely affect the health of the cow, we’ll replace it with another cow of equivalent value at no cost to you. The reason for death should be certified by a certified VET technician and we shall expect you to email us a copy of this health report. Nothing makes us happier than knowing that we did bring much joy into your home with one of our babies. We do constantly give you health advice to make sure your cow remains healthy. Here are a couple of measures which will help: Send us a copy of the health examination (medical record) within 10 business days of receiving your cow. The examination must be carried out by a licensed VET. Your cow comes with age-appropriate vaccinations, so you do not need to vaccinate the cow again. Exceptions to this Guarantee Failure to provide your cow with regular vet care will go against this health guarantee. We require all our cows to undergo a thorough checkup before they are shipped to you. This checkup is performed by our licensed vet who issues the Veterinary Health reports for all our puppies. This report certifies the health condition of every cow against Cardiovascular, Skin, cow, Eyes, Mouth, Teeth, Gums, Musculoskeletal, Respiratory, Ears, Urogenital, and Gastrointestinal diseases. This health report will be filled out on the date of shipping the Cow to you so that you are assured that the Cow’s health is guaranteed. This report is then reviewed for any issues or concerns notated by our veterinarian. And if there are any serious issues with the cow then he/she will not be shipped to you. We also require you to get your cow examined by a licensed veterinarian within ten days of receiving the cow. Thanks for your cooperation. Copyright © 2024 [minihighlandcattlesfarm.]
